name: Mario no Photopi
description: Mario no Photopi (Japanese: マリオのふぉとぴー, Hepburn: Mario no Fotopī) is a creativity video game released for the Nintendo 64 in 1998 exclusively in Japan. With a variety of photo retouching and image composition functions, SmartMedia storage card slots, and planned 64DD floppy disk compatibility, the game was intended to supplant the Japanese market's desire for a personal computer.
